SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE_TAG_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, READ_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END B_CREATE_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO =B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TITLE_TAG T ON(T.TITLE_TAG_NO=B.TITLE_TAG_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
